alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Ozark; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 10:27PM CDT until March 23 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ozark County in southwestern Missouri... Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... Eastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1026 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Diggins to 12 miles southeast of Sparta to near Taneyville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bryant Creek State Park, Ava, Wasola, Brixey, Noble, Willhoit, Brushyknob, Brownbranch, Elkhead, Keltner, Gentryville, Thornfield, Rome, Vanzant, Squires, Bradleyville, Dora, Goodhope, Rockbridge and Drury. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
